#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ff first 
#define ss second

typedef long long i64;
typedef pair<i64,i64> pll;
i64 len,l,h,mid,t,n,a[123456],i,M[123456],p[123456],ans;

void lis(){
	i64 i;
	M[0]=0;
	p[0]=-1;
	len=1;
	for(i=1;i<n;i++){
		if(a[i]<a[M[0]])
		M[0]=i,p[i]=-1;
		else if(a[i]>a[M[len-1]])
		M[len]=i,p[i]=M[len-1],len++;
		else{
			l=0,h=len-1,ans=LONG_LONG_MIN;
			while(l<=h){
				mid=(l+h)/2;
				if(a[M[mid]]<a[i])
				l=mid+1,ans=max(mid,ans);
				else
				h=mid-1;
			}
			M[ans+1]=i,p[i]=M[ans];
		}
	}
}

int main(){
	//freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
	//freopen("out.txt","w",stdout);	
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>n;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>a[i];
		lis();
		i64 k=M[len-1];
		while(p[k]!=-1) 
		k=p[k];
		
		cout<<len<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
